file_content.text: If you're ever in this part of the galaxy again, feel free to visit.
Lady! Tyresius escaped! He hit us with a stun grenade.
I watched you disarm him. Where did he get that weapon?
One of his horns was fake. He hid the grenade inside it. Please, don't cripple me. It's not my fault.
You owe your champion, Lady. Better pay up.
I demand compensation.
I have to hand it to that smuggler. He's not just lucky, he's good.
Tyresius is clever.
He manipulated me into escorting him away from you. It's so obvious, now. I hate him.
No Tyresius? I'm about to kill everyone in this place--starting with you, Lady.
You lost my payment, you die.
I find your threats intoxicating, but let's not get ahead of ourselves.
One of you saw where Tyresius went, yes?
He stole a swoop bike and a hyperdrive regulator; he could be anywhere by now.
But I'll find him. The swoop bikes all have homing beacons--a precaution against thieving Jawas and stupid guards.
I'll consult my tracker... ah, there he is. The stolen swoop bike stopped at these coordinates in the deep desert.
Boss, if Tyresius stole a hyperdrive regulator, he might be trying to fix his old ship--the one that got shot down.
I'm not sure why Tyresius took a hyperdrive regulator, unless he's trying to repair a starship.
Knowing Tyresius, I don't have much time to catch him.
I'd better get moving.
When you do, please hurt him for me. A lot.
Lady, it's been nice knowing you.
Well, it's been fun.
I don't say this often, but the pleasure has been all mine. Good luck.
He won't be fixing anything when I'm done with him.
Not while I'm around.
I recommend breaking his fingers and moving up from there. Have fun.
Borga! My sweet, precious boy!
Delicious. For a moment I thought Borga might kill you, bounty hunter.
He fought like a big dumb brute. Never stood a chance.
You overestimated him.
I wanted you to get your entertainment value.
Had to make it look good.
You most certainly did that.
It's sweet of you to care, Lady.
Thanks for the concern.
I always care when death and dismemberment are involved.
This isn't over, Lady! I'll return with a new champion.
I hope so, Fell. Our little gatherings always make my day. Kisses.
Go, my champion. Make me proud.
I'm ready to fight.
Wonderful. Fell Dargun, this is my new champion.
A bounty hunter? Borga will rip this fool limb from limb. Won't you, my beautiful boy?
I eat this worm's head! Rip out its guts and make a new puppet!
Save it for the match, Borga.
May the best fighter win.
Surely I can offer you something, Lady. An HK assassin droid? Fresh slaves, direct from Ryloth?
I already have those. Stop wasting my time.
What's wrong, Tyresius? Can't buy your way out of this?
Oh, boy. Here we go again....
Tyresius? Wait, you're actually--no! Shame on you, you naughty little Devaronian.
Sincerest apologies, Lady. Now that you know I'm the justifiably famous Tyresius Lokai, you also know my resources.
I need you to eliminate this bounty hunter and help me leave Tatooine. I'll pay generously, of course.
It would be rude to eliminate someone before I've heard her counter-offer. Well?
Intriguing, but I'd like to hear what this delicious specimen has to offer, first.
What do you want, Lady?
Let's negotiate.
Oh! My favorite question.
I don't think credits are your thing.
You want something special.
Very good. I find money dirty. And not in the fun way.
Who do you want dead? I can offer you a bulk discount.
I'm good at killing.
What a wonderfully sweet offer.
I have a keen interest in gladiatorial contests. A match is scheduled for today, and I've lost my beloved champion.
Whoever fights as my new champion could ask any favor of me.
Consider me your new champion.
Done.
If I'm your champion, I'll expect all sorts of favors.
[Flirt] Only one favor?
Is that really what you're into?
Careful what you wish for. Most men are too fragile for me.
I'm considering it.
It's not looking good for you, Tyresius.
I'm not here to make deals. I'm here to kill Tyresius Lokai--and anyone standing in my way.
I'll kill you both, instead.
Try it, and I'll disintegrate him. That means no bounty for you. I suggest one of you take my deal.
This isn't exactly a fair negotiation, Lady. I'm no gladiator.
I'm sure one of these men would fight in your place, for a price.
All right. I'll make anyone who fights for me obscenely rich. Once in a lifetime opportunity!
Someone is bound to take his offer, bounty hunter. Won't you be my champion?
If it means I get Tyresius, I'll do it.
Fine, you win.
Sounds like fun.
Excellent. I do enjoy a good fight. All that sweat and blood....
Now, now. Don't be too quick. It disappoints the fans.
Lady, this is a terrible mistake. Don't be a fool.
Fool? Guards, take Tyresius away... and remove his tongue. You don't need it, do you?
I'd prefer it if you left him intact.
Leave him alone.
Very well. I suppose he's your property--assuming you win the match.
If you want it, take it.
I'm happy either way.
Thank you. It'll be my proof that he was here.
Shall I do the tongue-removing for you?
No, but I'd love to help.
How thoughtful, but I'm not sure you could resist finishing him off.
Put Tyresius someplace safe, guards. And watch him--he's slippery.
You haven't heard the last of me--either of you.
Your opponent is in the next room. When you're ready, meet me and my guests there.
If you're here to barter, speak to one of the traders. I don't have time for such trivial concerns.
This deal had better be legit.
